amendment.description: Amendment decreases the Federal Transit Administration by $2 million and increases the Technical Assistance and Training by a similar amount which brings funding back to the FY 2014 level.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to decrease the Federal Transit Administration by $2 million and increase the Technical Assistance and Training by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Langevin.
